title: Beautiful 4br/2ba House for rent! Move In Today!!
posting_body: 4bedroom house located on the Corpus Christi, TX ,South Side.
We have a beautiful 4br/2ba Lake House for rent.
The house belongs to my mother.
The in-law apartment is the entire upstairs of the house, my mother lives downstairs.
The house is located on Corpus Christi.
You will have access to the entire house but the upstairs comes furnished and has a bath/shower and small kitchenette.
Big deck for BBQs and entertaining.
Shed for storage and beach access rights.
The rent will be 1050/month and includes all utilities.
The yard is big and there is a garden if you would like to plant veggies or herbs.
My mother is 67 very cool and mostly keeps to herself.
Fire pit for those long summer nights, fourth of July fireworks on the lake and a really private cool community.
please call for more information about house:CALL:
